data.name: ShooterSpheres
data.detailed_description: Welcome to the world of steel and guns , fight your way from the Citadel through many areas to the city , where the magistrates are taking ordinary citizens and turning them into fighting cyborgs. Evade the deadly traps , find the keys , pickups, collectibles and powerups throughout the lands to work your way to the centronix factory to free the citizens from the warmongering grasp of the city leaders. Can you save the day? Carefull when searching where you look or you may not find what you need.
data.about_the_game: Welcome to the world of steel and guns , fight your way from the Citadel through many areas to the city , where the magistrates are taking ordinary citizens and turning them into fighting cyborgs. Evade the deadly traps , find the keys , pickups, collectibles and powerups throughout the lands to work your way to the centronix factory to free the citizens from the warmongering grasp of the city leaders. Can you save the day? Carefull when searching where you look or you may not find what you need.
data.short_description: A fanatastic action shooter game , with environmental and other puzzles , collectibles and good sized levels. With weapons , melee , and stealth. Creative handcrafted level designs , with a modern , yet old school feel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7 / windows 8 / windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: AMD A10 - 6700 3.0 GHz / Intel core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 2GB / Radeon R7 265 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance and specs can vary depending on game settings and system where lower processors and graphics cards may work on some systems

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
